name: McInnis Park Pickleball Courts
description: Four outdoor hard courts with permanent pickleball lines are available at McInnis Park, San Rafael. Courts can be reserved through the Marin County Parks reservation system, and a fee is required for reservations. The facility includes restrooms and water fountains, and is wheelchair accessible. Nets are provided on site.
hours: Sunrise to sunset daily (courts reserved until 9pm)
open_play_schedule: Open play available daily during park hours; reservation recommended
fees: Park has fee; $13 to reserve two courts for one hour (per Marin County Parks).

name: Hill Recreation Area Pickleball Courts
description: Six brand-new fenced outdoor pickleball courts are available at Hill Recreation Area in Novato. The courts are dedicated to pickleball and open daily from sunrise to 8:00pm for free drop-in play. No reservations or fees are required. The facility has parking, but restrooms and water are not specified.

name: Piper Park Pickleball Courts
description: Eight outdoor hard courts at Piper Park in Larkspur are dedicated for pickleball play (with permanent lines and portable nets). Courts are lighted for evening use and are open daily for free drop-in play. The facility includes restrooms and water fountains. No reservations are required.

name: Marinship Park Pickleball Courts
description: Marinship Park in Sausalito has three outdoor lighted pickleball courts (plus two tennis courts). These courts are open to Marinship Park members only by reservation; the park is open daily 8am-10pm. Restrooms are available at the park, and lights shut off at 10pm. Nets and lines are permanent on the dedicated pickleball courts.

name: Rec Center at Golden Gate Village Pickleball Courts
description: The recreational area at Golden Gate Village (Marin City, Sausalito) offers four outdoor asphalt pickleball courts with permanent nets and lines. These dedicated courts are open for drop-in play during community hours. Restrooms and parking are available. A one-time permit fee is required for residents to use the courts.

name: Eastwood Park Pickleball Courts
description: Eastwood Park in Mill Valley has four outdoor dedicated pickleball courts on concrete surfaces with permanent lines (two on tennis courts, two separate). Courts are available for free drop-in play daily from 8:00am to sunset. The facility includes restrooms and water fountains. No nets are provided (players bring nets).

name: Strawberry Recreation District - Tennis Courts Pickleball
description: The Strawberry Recreation District in Mill Valley operates two lit tennis courts (118 E. Strawberry Dr) that also serve as pickleball courts. There are 2 pickleball courts striped on tennis courts. Courts are open daily from 8:00am to 10:00pm (lights on). Restrooms and water fountains are available on site. Play is first-come, first-served with no fees.

name: Strawberry Recreation District - Sports Courts Pickleball
description: At the Strawberry Recreation District facility in Mill Valley, the outdoor sports court includes 2 striped pickleball courts (and a basketball court). These two pickleball courts have lights for evening use and are open daily from 8:00am to 10:00pm. Restrooms and water are available onsite, and play is free without reservation.

name: Corte Madera Town Park Pickleball Courts
description: Town Park in Corte Madera has two dedicated outdoor pickleball courts with permanent lines and portable nets. Courts are lighted and open daily from 8:00am to 10:00pm. The facility includes restrooms and water fountains. Play is first-come, first-served with no fees.
